addOnBlur.description: Whether to add an item when the input loses focus.
addOnBlur.description_zh: 是否在输入失去焦点时添加项目。

allowDuplicate.description: Whether to allow duplicate values or not.

separator.description: Separator char to add an item when pressed in addition to the enter key.
separator.description_zh: 除回车键外，用于在按下时添加项目的分隔符字符。

inputId.description: Identifier of the focus input to match a label defined for the chips.
inputId.description_zh: 焦点输入的标识符，用于匹配为芯片定义的标签。

inputClass.description: Style class of the input field.

inputStyle.description: Inline style of the input field.

inputProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement to the focusable input element inside the component.
inputProps.description_zh: 用于将 HTMLInputElement 的所有属性传递给组件内的可聚焦输入元素。

removeTokenIcon.description: Icon to display in chip remove action.
removeTokenIcon.description_zh: 要在芯片移除操作中显示的图标。

disabled.description: When present, it specifies that the element should be disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 如果存在，则指定应禁用该元素。

aria-labelledby.description: Establishes relationships between the component and label(s) where its value should be one or more element IDs.
aria-labelledby.description_zh: 在组件和标签之间建立关系，其中其值应为一个或多个元素 ID。

aria-label.description: Establishes a string value that labels the component.
aria-label.description_zh: 建立标记组件的字符串值。

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.
pt.description_zh: 用于将属性传递给组件内部的 DOM 元素。

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.
ptOptions.description_zh: 用于配置组件的直通 （pt） 选项。

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
unstyled.description_zh: 启用后，它会删除核心中与组件相关的样式。

events.name: add
events.description: Callback to invoke when a chip is added.
events.description_zh: 添加芯片时调用的回调。

events.name: remove
events.description: Callback to invoke when a chip is removed.
events.description_zh: 移除芯片时调用的回调。
